data.title: Honor Mission: Monthly Moment of Remembrance, Bridgeville, Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Honor Mission Monthly Moment of Remembrance Bridgeville, Pennsylvania - August 7, 2024 About the Mission: The Patriot Guard Riders will stand a flag-line at the National Cemetery of the Alleghenies for the Monthly Moment of Remembrance, for veterans that have been interred in the past month without Military Honors. Primary Staging Details: August 7, 2024 --
data.meta_site_name: Patriot Guard Riders Pennsylvania - Standing For Those Who Stood For Us
data.text:
Briefing: 8:45 AM

Flag-line: 9:00 AM

Note: This is a recurring Honor Mission held on the first Wednesday of every month.

VA regulations 38 CFR 1.218: It is prohibited to carry firearms (either openly or concealed), explosives or other dangerous or deadly weapons on VA property.
